subject: JUnitOpenTool
msgSnippet: Has anyone tried out JUitOpenTool with JBuilder? It seems to work nicely except that in some cases running tests from the JUnitMenuItem produces a
messageBody:
Has anyone tried out JUitOpenTool with JBuilder?

It seems to work nicely except that in some cases running tests from
the JUnitMenuItem produces a java.lang.IncompatibleClassChangeError.
This error does not happen when I run the tests from a static main.

Has anyone experienced this problem? What did you do to fix it?

Thanks, -Brian
